author: dberlin
msg: Handle pkg.m4 the subversion way, by copying it into build/ in autogen.sh
* autogen.sh: Find and copy pkgconfig's pkg.m4
* aclocal.m4: Revert to clean version, add build/pkg.m4 to sinclude list.

author: dberlin
msg: Add merge info parser to subr, and cleanup existing type usage to
* subversion/include/svn_types.h: Rename mergeinfo enums to have SVN in front.
Rename merge info types to have svn in front.

author: malcolm
msg: Properly fix diff_tests 31 (diff a property change plus a local prop edit).
In a repos->WORKING diff with changed directory properties, provide the
consumer with the repos->WORKING property changes, not the repos->BASE
(close_directory): Use the BASE->repos propchanges to calculate the
pristine repository properties, then combine with the WORKING
properties to derive the WORKING->repos propchanges.
